system.description:
Your inborn psychic ability and the power granted by your divine patron have become like two sides of the same coin. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Wisdom score or your Intelligence score increases by +1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Your Esper levels count as cleric levels for the purpose of acquiring and using the Providence feature.
  • You may spend any number of dice from your Psychic Reservoir as if you had rolled a 1 on them to regain Cleric spell slots with total levels equal to the dice spent. For example, if you spent 3 psionic dice this way, you could recover a third level spell slot, three first level spell slots, or a second level spell slot and a first level spell slot. You cannot exceed your normal number of spell slots available at once for a level this way, and once you have used this benefit, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.
  • While your Psychic Focus is active you gain an additional benefit based on your discipline:
    • Empathic: You have advantage on saves to disbelieve illusions.
    • Kinesthetic: Your speed increases by 10 feet.
    • Telepathic: Creatures attempting to read your mind must save against your spell save DC or take 2d8 radiant or necrotic damage (selected when you take this feat).
    • Telekinetic: You may wield a spellcasting focus without needing a hand free.
